src:
Gavrilović: Lakše je spremiti tim kada igrate Evrokup
“Evroliga se igra četvrtkom i petkom, a ove nedelje smo imali i dupli program”, žali se Zvezdin trener

03 Nov 2019

Trener Crvene zvezde Andrija Gavrilović govorio je sa mnogo komplimenata o ekipi Cibone, a novinarima u Hrvatskoj je dočarao i probleme sa kojima se njegov klub suočava prilikom pripreme za svaki meč regionalnog takmičenja."Očekivao sam veliku borbu i dobru igru Cibone. Oni su napravili ekipu koja je borbena na svakom meču. Pripremio sam igrače za takvu utakmicu. Trudili smo se da osujetimo njihov kontranapad. Imali smo velikih padova, najpre rezultatskih, ali uspeli smo da slavimo i to je najbitnije. Za razliku od Evrokupa, Evroliga se igra u četvrtak i petak. Imali smo dva meča u tri dana i to nam oduzima dosta energije. Lakše je spremiti tim kada igrate Evrokup. Ali, mi moramo da se borimo sa tim i da ABA ligu stavimo na prvo mesto", rekao je Gavrilović posle meča u Zagrebu.
Zvezdin trener se požalio i na dupli program prošle nedelje."Evroliga se igra četvrtkom i petkom, a ove nedelje smo imali i dupli program. Ne samo što nam oduzima energiju, već imamo više vremena da se spremimo za nju nego za mečeve ABA lige. A voleo bih da je obrnuto. Igrači se potroše, teško je da se vrate u optimalno stanje. A ABA liga nas vodi u Evroligu i zato ima ogromnu važnost", istakao je Gavrilović.
Foto: Star Sport
text:
Gavrilovic: It's easier to save a team when you play Euro Cup
"The Euroleague is played on Thursdays and Fridays, and this week we had a double program," complains Zvezda's coach

03 Nov 2019

Red Star coach Andrija Gavrilovic spoke with many compliments on Cibona's team, and he told reporters in Croatia the problems his club faces when preparing for each match of the regional competition. "I expected a great fight and a good game for Cibona. They made the team which is combative in every match. I prepared the players for such a match. We tried to thwart their counterattack. We had big falls, first results, but we were able to celebrate and that is the most important. Unlike Eurocup, Euroleague is played on Thursday and Friday. We had two matches in three days and that takes us a lot of energy. It's easier to prepare the team when you play Euro Cup. But we have to fight it and put the ABA league in the first place, "Gavrilovic said after the match. Zagreb.
Zvezda's coach also complained about the double program last week. "The Euroleague is played on Thursdays and Fridays, and this week we had a double program. Not only does it take away our energy, but we have more time to prepare for it than for ABA league matches. And I wish it was the other way around. The players are wasted, it's hard to get back to the optimal state.
Photo: Star Sport
